[Home](./index.md) &gt; [onespan-sign-node](./onespan-sign-node.md) &gt; [GetAllPackagesParameters](./onespan-sign-node.getallpackagesparameters.md) &gt; [searchtype](./onespan-sign-node.getallpackagesparameters.searchtype.md)

## GetAllPackagesParameters.searchtype property

When empty, a wildcard search will be done in the package name and description for the search value, otherwise the allowable values will make more restrictive searches.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
searchtype?: 'exact' | 'exactname';
```
